greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle T(n,k)=sum{k=0..n, C(j,k)C(j,n-k)}.
comment: T(n,k)=T(n,n-k). Second column is A028387. Row sums are A014300. Central coefficients T(2n,n) are A112029.
program: tabl(nn)={for (n=0, nn, for(k=0, n, print1(sum(j=0, n, binomial(j,k)*binomial(j,n-k)),", ");); print(););};
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 13 2006
